HowToAcknowledge: Data in this repository has been used in multiple projects. When using the data in the subfolders /anat and /dwi, please cite this paper: https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/645234v3.full and consider including the following message: 'This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database. Its accession number is XXXX'
